Package com.thalesgroup.gemalto.d1.card

Class DigitalCard.DeviceBinding

java.lang.Object
com.thalesgroup.gemalto.d1.card.DigitalCard.DeviceBinding
Enclosing class:
DigitalCard
public static final class DigitalCard.DeviceBinding extends Object
Device Binding information. Represents the binding of a digital card to a specific device. Contains information about the binding reference, device name, and binding status.
Since:
4.3.0

  • Constructor Details

    • DeviceBinding

      public DeviceBinding(@Nullable String bindingReference, @Nullable String deviceName, @Nullable DigitalCard.DeviceBinding.Status bindingStatus)
      Public Constructor for DeviceBinding. Creates a new DeviceBinding instance with the specified binding reference, device name, and binding status.
      Parameters:
      bindingReference - The unique reference identifier for this binding.
      deviceName - The name of the device associated with this binding.
      bindingStatus - The current status of the binding: DigitalCard.DeviceBinding.Status.APPROVED, DigitalCard.DeviceBinding.Status.DECLINED, or DigitalCard.DeviceBinding.Status.CHALLENGED.
      Since:
      4.3.0

  • Method Details

    • getBindingReference

      @Nullable public String getBindingReference()
      Gets the binding reference. The binding reference is a unique identifier for this device binding.
      Returns:
      The binding reference. May be null.
      Since:
      4.3.0

    • getDeviceName

      @Nullable public String getDeviceName()
      Gets the device name. Returns the name of the device associated with this binding.
      Returns:
      The device name. May be null.
      Since:
      4.3.0

    • getBindingStatus

      @Nullable public DigitalCard.DeviceBinding.Status getBindingStatus()
      Gets the binding status. Returns the current status of the device binding, which can be APPROVED, DECLINED, or CHALLENGED.
      Returns:
      The binding status. May be null.
      Since:
      4.3.0
